response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. I understand its significance and believe it would greatly enhance your endeavors or personal pursuits. Given its worth to you, I am extending a special offer to purchase this product at a price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true value of $1,200,000, while still allowing me to recoup a substantial portion of its worth. I look forward to discussing the details further with you and exploring how we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 950000}
